awayfromauction.apitest.fail: [AfA] You Hypixel API key didn't work. Make sure you set it correctly, and try again!
awayfromauction.autoapikey.success: [AfA] Sucessfully grabbed your Hypixel API key from chat!
awayfromauction.command.joinhypixel.fail: [AfA] Didn't connect to Hypixel! Already connected!
awayfromauction.command.joinhypixel.star: [AfA] Now prompting to connecting to Hypixel...
awayfromauction.command.key.fail: [AfA] Failed to save your Hypixel API key! Please try again!
awayfromauction.command.key.success: [AfA] Sucessfully saved your Hypixel API key!
awayfromauction.command.search.itemnotfo: [AfA] No item by that name could be found!
awayfromauction.command.searchuser.notfo: [AfA] No user by that username could be found!
awayfromauction.command.stats:
[AfA] Current Auction House Stats:
* Number of currently active auctions: %d
* Number of unique items up for auction (incl. reforges): %d
* Number of active auctions you own: %d
* Number of active auctions you've bid on: %d
* Number of coins currently in bids in the auction house: %s
awayfromauction.command.supriseme.succes: [AfA] Viewing a random auction, please wait...
awayfromauction.command.usage:
[AfA] Usage:
/afa viewall: View all auctions.
/afa viewbids: View all auctions you've bid on.
/afa search [Item Name]: Search the auction house for a specific item.
/afa searchuser [Username]: Search the auction house for active auctions by a specific user.
/afa supriseme: Shows a random auction.
/afa view <uuid>: Shows info on an auction.
/afa stats: Shows some various stats about the auction house.
/afa key <key>: Manually set your Hypixel API key.
/afa test: Test your API key.
/afa joinhypixel: Promps you to join the Hypixel server.
awayfromauction.command.view.success: [AfA] Viewing auction with UUID %s. Click this message to view again.
awayfromauction.command.view.usage: [AfA] /afa view <auction uuid>: Pulls up detailed information on a specific auction. Use /afa search or /afa searchuser to search the auction house.
awayfromauction.error.noauctions: [AfA] An error occured syncing auctions! Check your logs for more info.
awayfromauction.error.notsync: [AfA] Auctions not synced yet! Please wait about %d seconds and try again.
awayfromauction.gui.joinhypixel.body:
You are about to leave your current server/world and join mc.hypixel.net.

Are you sure you want to do this?
awayfromauction.gui.joinhypixel.title: WARNING: About to change servers!
